item.title: PK help
item.dc:creator: @StormpkScape StormpkScape
item.description:
@StormpkScape wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:23, topic:365579”] if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkbox") && (!playerHasItem(7142, 1) || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7142)) { toX = %%%%; toY = $$$$; sM("Welcome to the PK Box."); } [/quote][quote=“usman555, post:24, topic:365579”] if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkbox") && playerHasItem(555, 1) || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 555) { sM("Please remove your 1 hit weapon."); } else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkbox") && !playerHasItem(555, 1) && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 555) { toX = %%%%; toY = $$$$; sM("Welcome to the PK Box."); }[/quote]

which one? and are you teling me delta or PI

Read full topic

item.title: PK help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkbox") && playerHasItem(####, 1) || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) { sM("Please remove your 1 hit weapon."); } else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkbox") && !playerHasItem(####, 1) && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) { toX = %%%%; toY = $$$$; sM("Welcome to the PK Box."); }

Read full topic

item.title: PK help
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

        if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkbox") && (!playerHasItem(7142, 1) || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7142)) {
            toX = %%%%;
            toY = $$$$;
            sM("Welcome to the PK Box.");
        }

This wont send them a message telling them why they can’t use the command - If you want that use Usman’s code.

Read full topic

item.title: PK help
item.dc:creator: @StormpkScape StormpkScape
item.description:
@StormpkScape wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:21, topic:365579”][quote author=StormpkScape link=topic=461784.msg3378605#msg3378605 date=1287846889]
Well, I know I’m stupid, but I don’t see it Steve…
[/quote]Hold on, let me fix it.

EDIT:

} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkbox") && !playerHasItem(####, 1)) && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != ####) {[/quote]

Now I only have 7 errors…

[code]client.java:9098: illegal start of expression
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkbox”) && playerHasItem(7142, 1)) || playerEquipme
nt[playerWeapon] == 7142) {
^
client.java:9098: not a statement
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkbox”) && playerHasItem(7142, 1)) || playerEquipme
nt[playerWeapon] == 7142) {

             ^

client.java:9098: ‘;’ expected
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkbox”) && playerHasItem(7142, 1)) || playerEquipme
nt[playerWeapon] == 7142) {

                    ^

client.java:9100: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkbox”) && !playerHasItem(7142, 1)) && playe
rEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7142) {
^
client.java:9100: illegal start of expression
} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkbox”) && !playerHasItem(7142, 1)) && playe
rEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7142) {
^
client.java:9100: not a statement
} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkbox”) && !playerHasItem(7142, 1)) && playe
rEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7142) {

                     ^

client.java:9100: ‘;’ expected
} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkbox”) && !playerHasItem(7142, 1)) && playe
rEquipment[playerWeapon] != 7142) {

                            ^

7 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Sorry about all my issues

Read full topic

item.title: PK help

item.description:

[code]client.java:9099: illegal start of expression
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkbox”) && playerHasItem(7142, 1)) || playerEquipme
nt[playerWeapon] == 7142) { // if command is ::pkbox and you have the item 7142
or you are wearing the item 7142…

nt[playerWeapon] == 7142) { // if command is ::pkbox and you have the item 7142
or you are wearing the item 7142…

nt[playerWeapon] == 7142) { // if command is ::pkbox and you have the item 7142
or you are wearing the item 7142…

client.java:9102: ‘else’ without ‘if’

quipment[playerWeapon] != 7142) { // if command is ::pkbox and you don’t have it
em 7142, and you aren’t wearing 7142…
^
client.java:9102: ‘)’ expected
} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkbox”) !playerHasItem(7142, 1)) && playerE
quipment[playerWeapon] != 7142) { // if command is ::pkbox and you don’t have it
em 7142, and you aren’t wearing 7142…

quipment[playerWeapon] != 7142) { // if command is ::pkbox and you don’t have it
em 7142, and you aren’t wearing 7142…
^

quipment[playerWeapon] != 7142) { // if command is ::pkbox and you don’t have it
em 7142, and you aren’t wearing 7142…
^
client.java:9102: not a statement
} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkbox”) !playerHasItem(7142, 1)) && playerE
quipment[playerWeapon] != 7142) { // if command is ::pkbox and you don’t have it
em 7142, and you aren’t wearing 7142…

client.java:9102: ‘;’ expected
} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkbox”) !playerHasItem(7142, 1)) && playerE
quipment[playerWeapon] != 7142) { // if command is ::pkbox and you don’t have it

item.title: PK help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I added conventions, my friend. That’s to teach him. Only if he reads them.
Because this…

/* Pefect pkbox code by Usman. Prevents the 1 hit weapon from entering */ // #### = 1 Hit Weapon ID %%%% = X Coord $$$$ = Y Coord // if command is ::pkbox and you have the item #### or you are wearing the item ####.... // tell the player to... // remove your 1 hit weapon and try again // if command is ::pkbox and you don't have item ####, and you aren't wearing ####.... // Set X coords to %%%% // Set Y coords to $$$$ // send the player the message... // Welcome to the Pk Box, this will also teleport them. // end the command. Credits to Usman
I don't think is spoon feeding. It's larger then the entire code that is being used itself.

Read full topic

item.title: PK help
item.dc:creator: @StormpkScape StormpkScape
item.description:
@StormpkScape wrote:

usman555:

That’s because you are checking only the inventory. Check the player’s weapon slot aswell.

How do I do that?

Read full topic

item.title: PK help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

That’s because you are checking only the inventory. Check the player’s weapon slot aswell.

/* Pefect pkbox code by Usman. Prevents the 1 hit weapon from entering */ // #### = 1 Hit Weapon ID %%%% = X Coord $$$$ = Y Coord if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkbox") && playerHasItem(####, 1)) || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) { // if command is ::pkbox and you have the item #### or you are wearing the item ####.... sM("Please remove your 1 hit weapon."); // tell the player to... // remove your 1 hit weapon and try again } else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkbox") !playerHasItem(####, 1)) && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != ####) { // if command is ::pkbox and you don't have item ####, and you aren't wearing ####.... toX = %%%%; // Set X coords to %%%% toY = $$$$; // Set Y coords to $$$$ sM("Welcome to the PK Box."); // send the player the message... // Welcome to the Pk Box, this will also teleport them. } // end the command. Credits to Usman

Read full topic
